CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Through the variation of DPP to TPD composition in the polymers , we successfully tuned the frontier energy levels and illustrated the benefits of this approach in relation to PSC device performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. DPP (Donor: Acceptor ratio in polymers)
2. TPD (Acceptor in polymers)
3. Polymers (Material type)
4. Frontier energy levels (Property of materials)
5. PSC (Perovskite Solar Cells) (Type of device)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. TPD (Acceptor in polymers)
2. Polymers
3. PSC (Perovskite Solar Cells)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Polymers |
| PSC (Perovskite Solar Cells) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Through the variation of DPP to TPD composition in the polymers , we successfully tuned the frontier energy levels and illustrated the benefits of this approach in relation to PSC device performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. DPP (Donor:Acceptor ratio in Polymer:Polymer Composition)
2. TPD (Acceptor:Donor ratio in Polymer:Polymer Composition)
3. Frontier energy levels (Energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) in the polymers)
4. PSC (Perovskite Solar Cell)
5. Device performance (The efficiency and effectiveness of the Perovskite Solar Cell)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. DPP (Donor:Acceptor ratio in Polymer:Polymer Composition)
2. TPD (Acceptor:Donor ratio in Polymer:Polymer Composition)
3. Frontier energy levels (Energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) in the polymers)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| TPD (Acceptor:Donor ratio in Polymer:Polymer Composition) |
